name: lime destiny
description:
{{It's a really bad game by a really bad developer}}  

Play the new and improved Walmart brand  PAC-MAN !!!!!!!!

Note:(Pac-man is not my creation, I am just making an off-brand version.) 

But his name is Kido.

I am a 12-year old beginning "Game developer" if that would even qualify and this is the start of my long journey to becoming a game developer.

And I want to thank Toby Fox for inspiring me to become a developer with his masterpieces  Undertale and Deltarune .
